required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study to Evaluate the Safety and Efficacy of ASC40 in Subjects With Moderate to Severe Acne Vulgaris
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase II Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled, Multi-center, Multi-dose Study to Evaluate Safety and Efficacy of ASC40 Tablets in Subjects With Moderate to Severe Acne Vulgaris.

brief_summary.textblock: This is a phase2, randomized, double-blind, multi-center, multi-dose and placebo parallel controlled design. The subjects in the study group were given double-blind drugs, and they were taken (orally) after dinner every day according to the requirements of clinical trial scheme.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: Percentage change of total lesion count compared with baseline and week 12.
Ratio of subjects, whose IGA grades was decreased by ≥2 grades compared with baseline at week 12.

secondary_outcome.measure: The changes status and changes of average percentage of inflammatory skin lesions count, non-inflammatory skin lesions count and total skin lesions count compared with baseline.
Ratio of subjects, whose GA grades was 1 or 0, or GA grades was decreased y ≥2 grades compared with baseline and Improvements in classification

intervention.description: 25mg of ASC40 orally once daily for 12 weeks.
50mg of ASC40 orally once daily for 12 weeks.
75mg of ASC40 orally once daily for 12 weeks.
Placebo orally once daily for 12 weeks.
